content: these crochet baby mittens have delicate white detailing along the top of the mitten where it meets your wrist they use basic crochet stitches like single_crochet and double_crochet they also work in the front and back post for some stitches click here for an ad-free printable pdf of this pattern 1 1 https //store dollaryarnclub com/products/baby-mittens-crochet-pattern
